Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/bin/dnssec/dnssec-revoke.c

1/* $NetBSD: dnssec-revoke.c,v 1.4 2019/02/24 20:01:27 christos Exp $ */
2
3/*

14/*! \file */
15
16#include <config.h>
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19#include <stdbool.h>
20#include <stdlib.h>
21#include <unistd.h>
22
23#include <isc/buffer.h>
24#include <isc/commandline.h>
25#include <isc/file.h>
26#include <isc/hash.h>
27#include <isc/mem.h>
28#include <isc/print.h>
29#include <isc/string.h>
30#include <isc/util.h>
31
32#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
33#include <dns/result.h>
34
35#include <dst/dst.h>
36
37#if USE_PKCS11
38#include <pk11/result.h>
39#endif
40
41#include "dnssectool.h"
42
43const char *program = "dnssec-revoke";
44int verbose;
45
46static isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
47
48ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE static void
49usage(void) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
50
51static void
52usage(void) {
53 fprintf(stderr, "Usage:\n");
54 fprintf(stderr, " %s [options] keyfile\n\n", program);
55 fprintf(stderr, "Version: %s\n", VERSION);
56#if USE_PKCS11
57 fprintf(stderr, " -E engine: specify PKCS#11 provider "
58 "(default: %s)\n", PK11_LIB_LOCATION);
59#else
60 fprintf(stderr, " -E engine: specify OpenSSL engine\n");
61#endif
62 fprintf(stderr, " -f: force overwrite\n");
63 fprintf(stderr, " -h: help\n");
64 fprintf(stderr, " -K directory: use directory for key files\n");
65 fprintf(stderr, " -r: remove old keyfiles after "
66 "creating revoked version\n");
67 fprintf(stderr, " -v level: set level of verbosity\n");
68 fprintf(stderr, " -V: print version information\n");
69 fprintf(stderr, "Output:\n");
70 fprintf(stderr, " K<name>+<alg>+<new id>.key, "
71 "K<name>+<alg>+<new id>.private\n");
72
73 exit (-1);
74}
75
76int
77main(int argc, char **argv) {
78 isc_result_t result;
79 const char *engine = NULL;
80 char const *filename = NULL;
81 char *dir = NULL;
82 char newname[1024], oldname[1024];
83 char keystr[DST_KEY_FORMATSIZE];
84 char *endp;
85 int ch;
86 dst_key_t *key = NULL;
87 uint32_t flags;
88 isc_buffer_t buf;
89 bool force = false;
90 bool removefile = false;
91 bool id = false;
92
93 if (argc == 1)
94 usage();
95
96 result = isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx);
97 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
98 fatal("Out of memory");
99
100#if HAVE_PKCS11
101 pk11_result_register();
102#endif
103 dns_result_register();
104
105 isc_commandline_errprint = false;
106
107 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv, "E:fK:rRhv:V")) != -1) {
108 switch (ch) {
109 case 'E':
110 engine = isc_commandline_argument;
111 break;
112 case 'f':
113 force = true;
114 break;
115 case 'K':
116 /*
117 * We don't have to copy it here, but do it to
118 * simplify cleanup later
119 */
120 dir = isc_mem_strdup(mctx, isc_commandline_argument);
121 if (dir == NULL) {
122 fatal("Failed to allocate memory for "
123 "directory");
124 }
125 break;
126 case 'r':
127 removefile = true;
128 break;
129 case 'R':
130 id = true;
131 break;
132 case 'v':
133 verbose = strtol(isc_commandline_argument, &endp, 0);
134 if (*endp != '\0')
135 fatal("-v must be followed by a number");
136 break;
137 case '?':
138 if (isc_commandline_option != '?')
139 fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid argument -%c\n",
140 program, isc_commandline_option);
141 /* FALLTHROUGH */
142 case 'h':
143 /* Does not return. */
144 usage();
145
146 case 'V':
147 /* Does not return. */
148 version(program);
149
150 default:
151 fprintf(stderr, "%s: unhandled option -%c\n",
152 program, isc_commandline_option);
153 exit(1);
154 }
155 }
156
157 if (argc < isc_commandline_index + 1 ||
158 argv[isc_commandline_index] == NULL)
159 fatal("The key file name was not specified");
160 if (argc > isc_commandline_index + 1)
161 fatal("Extraneous arguments");
162
163 if (dir != NULL) {
164 filename = argv[isc_commandline_index];
165 } else {
166 result = isc_file_splitpath(mctx, argv[isc_commandline_index],
167 &dir, &filename);
168 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
169 fatal("cannot process filename %s: %s",
170 argv[isc_commandline_index],
171 isc_result_totext(result));
172 if (strcmp(dir, ".") == 0) {
173 isc_mem_free(mctx, dir);
174 dir = NULL;
175 }
176 }
177
178 result = dst_lib_init(mctx, engine);
179 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
180 fatal("Could not initialize dst: %s",
181 isc_result_totext(result));
182
183 result = dst_key_fromnamedfile(filename, dir,
184 DST_TYPE_PUBLIC|DST_TYPE_PRIVATE,
185 mctx, &key);
186 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
187 fatal("Invalid keyfile name %s: %s",
188 filename, isc_result_totext(result));
189
190 if (id) {
191 fprintf(stdout, "%u\n", dst_key_rid(key));
192 goto cleanup;
193 }
194 dst_key_format(key, keystr, sizeof(keystr));
195
196 if (verbose > 2)
197 fprintf(stderr, "%s: %s\n", program, keystr);
198
199 if (force)
200 set_keyversion(key);
201 else
202 check_keyversion(key, keystr);
203
204
205 flags = dst_key_flags(key);
206 if ((flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE) == 0) {
207 isc_stdtime_t now;
208
209 if ((flags & DNS_KEYFLAG_KSK) == 0)
210 fprintf(stderr, "%s: warning: Key is not flagged "
211 "as a KSK. Revoking a ZSK is "
212 "legal, but undefined.\n",
213 program);
214
215 isc_stdtime_get(&now);
216 dst_key_settime(key, DST_TIME_REVOKE, now);
217
218 dst_key_setflags(key, flags | DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE);
219
220 isc_buffer_init(&buf, newname, sizeof(newname));
221 dst_key_buildfilename(key, DST_TYPE_PUBLIC, dir, &buf);
222
223 if (access(newname, F_OK) == 0 && !force) {
224 fatal("Key file %s already exists; "
225 "use -f to force overwrite", newname);
226 }
227
228 result = dst_key_tofile(key, DST_TYPE_PUBLIC|DST_TYPE_PRIVATE,
229 dir);
230 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS) {
231 dst_key_format(key, keystr, sizeof(keystr));
232 fatal("Failed to write key %s: %s", keystr,
233 isc_result_totext(result));
234 }
235
236 isc_buffer_clear(&buf);
237 dst_key_buildfilename(key, 0, dir, &buf);
238 printf("%s\n", newname);
239
240 /*
241 * Remove old key file, if told to (and if
242 * it isn't the same as the new file)
243 */
244 if (removefile) {
245 isc_buffer_init(&buf, oldname, sizeof(oldname));
246 dst_key_setflags(key, flags & ~DNS_KEYFLAG_REVOKE);
247 dst_key_buildfilename(key, DST_TYPE_PRIVATE, dir, &buf);
248 if (strcmp(oldname, newname) == 0)
249 goto cleanup;
250 (void)unlink(oldname);
251 isc_buffer_clear(&buf);
252 dst_key_buildfilename(key, DST_TYPE_PUBLIC, dir, &buf);
253 (void)unlink(oldname);
254 }
255 } else {
256 dst_key_format(key, keystr, sizeof(keystr));
257 fatal("Key %s is already revoked", keystr);
258 }
259
260cleanup:
261 dst_key_free(&key);
262 dst_lib_destroy();
263 if (verbose > 10)
264 isc_mem_stats(mctx, stdout);
265 if (dir != NULL)
266 isc_mem_free(mctx, dir);
267 isc_mem_destroy(&mctx);
268
269 return (0);
270}
271
